author: zhokin2
body:
#### PR description:

<!-- This branch includes 3 tasks:
CMT - supporting tool helping for certification of Hcal data;
RMT - supporting tool for monitoring of Hcal data including 
monitoring tasks for Calibration group;
AMT - macros based on use of root files produced by RMT for 
analyses like Raddam with Laser local runs, Gain stability 
with LEDs , phi-symmetry monitoring with use of local 
and global runs;  -->

#### PR validation:

<!-- Compilation is OK, tests run.
NB: no regular workflows are affected
 -->

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
title: HCAL: adding widely-used tools for additional data monitoring
